data.quote: It's not what you preach, it's what you tolerate.
data.author: Jocko Willink

data.quote: you are not rewarded for the comfortable choice.
data.author: Aubrey Marcus

data.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: Taking small steps each day will lead to success.
data.author: Jeff Olson

data.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be one.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: The whole future lies in uncertainty: live immediately.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: Selfcontrol is strength, right thought is mastery, calmness is power.
data.author: James Allen

data.quote: Success is based of your willingness to work your ass off no matter what obstacles are in your way.
data.author: David Goggins

data.quote: When someone is properly grounded in life, they shouldn't have to look outside themselves for approval.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: The ultimate power in life is to be completely self reliant, completely yourself.
data.author: Robert Greene
